verses.roman:
mukunda kahe,--prabhura ihāṅ haila āgamane
āmi-saba āsiyāchi mahāprabhura sane

synonyms: mukunda kahe—Mukunda replies; prabhura—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ihāṅ—here; haila—there was; āgamane—coming; āmi-saba—all of us; āsiyāchi—have come; mahāprabhura—Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sane—with.
translation: Mukunda Datta replied, "The Lord has already arrived here. We have come with Him."
